d: Benjamin is a bow tie pattern with four different shape options.

s.cutCollarBandFlag.t: The collar band is not shown
s.cutCollarBandFlag.d: The **Collar band** are two strips of fabric {{ height }} wide and {{ length }} long.

adjustmentRibbon.d: Whether or not to include an adjustment ribbon

adjustmentRibbonYes.d: Generate a pattern with an adjustment ribbon included

adjustmentRibbonNo.d: Generate a pattern without an adjustment ribbon included

bowStyle.widesquare.d: Use a wide square bow style

endStyle.straight.d: Use a straight style for the bow ends

endStyle.pointed.d: Use a pointy style for the bow ends

endStyle.rounded.d: Use a rounded style for the bow ends

collarEase.d: The amount of ease at your neck

collarBandHeight.d: The height (width if you will) of the collar band
